definition: aimless/at random
free/unrestrained/to inundate
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly

sentences.english: People walked through the streets aimlessly with nowhere to go, carrying the few bags and possessions they had left.
sentences.chinese: 人们带着仅剩的财物包裹漫无目的游荡。

sentences.english: After getting new email: waste 10 minutes aimlessly surfing the web.
sentences.chinese: 漫无目的的上上网，在收到一封信邮件后。

sentences.english: Do you find yourself floundering about aimlessly in life ?
sentences.chinese: 你会发现自己上徘徊约漫无目的地在人生？

sentences.english: I stood there, staring blindly across at the park.
sentences.chinese: 我站在那里，两眼漫无目的地往公园那边看来看去。

sentences.english: She wandered aimlessly around the streets.
sentences.chinese: 她在大街上漫无目的地到处游荡。

sentences.english: They are those things that are wandering around aimlessly in your head.
sentences.chinese: 它们是一些在你脑中漫无目的游走的东西。

sentences.english: Shortage is still severe aimlessly flowery and good-looking youth.
sentences.chinese: 依旧漫无目的地荒度如花貌美的青春。

sentences.english: A handful of soldiers and some civilians wandered about aimlessly.
sentences.chinese: 一小队士兵和几个普通市民漫无目的的在街上游荡着。

sentences.english: He wandered up and down the road aimlessly.
sentences.chinese: 他在大街上漫无目的地徘徊。

sentences.english: Without a target, you are aimless.
sentences.chinese: 没有了目标，你就是漫无目的的。

sentences.english: Keeping the information between the two tools synchronized was a hit or miss proposition.
sentences.chinese: 保持这两个工具间的信息同步是一个漫无目的的主张。

sentences.english: Therefore I tended to run away from myself, leading a purposeless life.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我总是自我逃避，漫无目的的生活。

sentences.english: I have done unnumbered wrongs, and aimlessly I roam about.
sentences.chinese: 我犯了数不清的错误，也漫无目的地漫游着。

sentences.english: If you're only doing without any goal in mind, it's not worth doing.
sentences.chinese: 而如果你只是漫无目的的做事，那就不值得了。

sentences.english: When you are aimless, you will not have that power from within to get there.
sentences.chinese: 如果你漫无目的，你就不可能有达成愿望的能力。

sentences.english: Do you live busily and purposelessly every day ?
sentences.chinese: 您还是每天忙碌漫无目的的过日子吗？

definition: to wander/to roam about/to loaf about/to be idle
to stroll
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom
to wander aimlessly
to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
extremely vast/boundless/limitless/digressing/discursive/going off on tangents/straying far off topic
to roam about/to monkey around
to rock/to sway/to shake
to have nothing to do/to idle one's time away (idiom)
swaying/wobbling
to swing/to sway/to wobble/to hang around/to hover around
headless fly (a metaphor for sb who is rushing around frantically)
to roll/to wander around/to appear repeatedly
see 無頭蒼蠅|无头苍蝇[wu2 tou2 cang1 ying5]
see 悠哉悠哉[you1 zai1 you1 zai1]
to stare blankly/to be stunned/to be lost in thought
